The most likely category for this paper would be "Video Games" (16) because it is discussing the game Age of Mythology Gold and its expansion pack. 

The second most likely category would be "Software" (15) because the paper is discussing a computer game.

The third most likely category would be "Books" (5) because the paper is discussing a game and its expansion pack, which could be considered as a form of literature.

The fourth most likely category would be "Movies & TV" (14) because the paper is discussing a form of entertainment, similar to movies and TV shows.

The fifth most likely category would be "Toys & Games" (7) because the paper is discussing a game and its expansion pack, which are considered as toys or games.

Title: NA
Content: Age of Mythology Gold gives you the award-winning, original title as well as the recently released Age of Mythology: The Titans expansion pack. Travel back to an ancient world alive with greater detail than ever, and experience exciting new gameplay elements and characters....
